statements: DELETE FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_name= 'Swing Trading' AND trend_analysis->>'trend_type' = 'uptrend';
DELETE FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 5 AND risk_level = 3;
DELETE FROM market_data WHERE data_id = 10 AND volume > 50000;
DELETE FROM market_data WHERE data_type = 'closing_price' AND data_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM market_trends WHERE trend_id = 10 AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM trade_history WHERE trade_id = 100 AND symbol = 'AAPL';
